items.text: similar line and length, covers the line and blocks
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: stops on him as he chips it in the air, but short of midwicket
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: opens the face late for a guide to third man
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: waits and opens the face to beat backward point to his right with a gentle dab
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length on leg, whipped to midwicket for one
items.postText: Sun's out, the game's very much on, and Shashank's back for a while.
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Thanks, Akshay. This should count as a decent Bangladesh beginning. Now to up the ante. Here's Nurse
items.text: drifts into middle and leg, tucked towards square leg
items.postText: Monir: "Is this the third test ongoing?"
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: tossed up, he lunges forward and blocks.
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: goes back and punches this into the gap at deep point. Tamim refuses the second
items.postText: Paps wonders: "Three catches dropped so far. Will Bangladesh will be able to take the advantage? "
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: right back into the crease as he defends to point
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: beauty! Drew him forward and then beat him with the dip and turn as he went for an expansive drive
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: swept uppishly, but lands short of deep square. Fetched it from way outside off.
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: pitched up and he belts this up and over mid-on, the outfield is slow so it stops. They take two.
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, 3 runs

items.text: hops back and defends this short of length delivery to the leg side
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: thuds into the thigh pad and deflects past where short leg would be as they scamper a legbye. He was looking to work it off his hip
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 leg bye

items.text: nicely worked off his hip to square leg.
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Make no mistake, this isn't the easiest of surfaces to bat on. The ball is stopping, the ball is turning. The oufield is slow. The key is for Bangladesh to assess how much is a good score and work towards that, rather than look for something ambitious and fall short. These two are more than capable of doing the rebuilding.
items.text: tucks this off his pad to fine leg
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: pulled away imperiously! Too short, he picked the length early and belted it away. Outfield slow, but it didn't matter.
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: eased with the spin to long-off
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: rocks back and cuts, excellent stop at backward point to save at least two
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: beauty again! Beaten in the air and off the pitch. Sharp turn as this zips past Shakib's jab.
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: rocks back to cut, gets a thick outside edge that flies past Gayle at slip, short third man runs across to stop that.
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: too short, rocks back and belts this into the gap at deep point
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: slides back in from around the stumps, sweeps and misses. This hits the pad, missing leg so no chance of an lbw
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Spin from both ends. Local boy Bishoo introduced.
items.text: yorker length, squeezed out.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Ahmed Ishtiaque's advice: "BD should keep 4 RPO till 30th overs losing not more than 2 wickets. They can eye for 130 in last 20 overs which takes the score 250 at the end, should be a competitive score." -- FYI - Par score here is 226.
items.text: right behind the line as he defends this to the off side.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run
